availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Benjamin R. Hester (Todd Co, Ky, minister and prov govt)

body.p: Todd County, Kentucky, methodist minister and provisional government convention member. North Carolina native. Married to Margaret H. Henry Hester in Sumner County, Tennessee, on December 7, 1840. Father of Moses H. Hester, George M.D. Hester, John B. Hester, L.A. Hester. Minister in Todd County, Kentucky, in 1850. Methodist minister in Todd County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, District 2, p. 250A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, p. 809.
Tennessee Marriage Records, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Tennessee, 1840-1849: Marriages (Loose Rec) A-P.
